summary: An imaginative blend of adventure and nature special that purports to investigate the discovery of a dragon's corpse in modern-day Romania. A British scientific team attempts to understand the creature's unique capabilities.
cast: Paul Hilton|Katrine Bach|Aidan Woodward|Tom Chadbon|Niccolo Cioni|Hamish MacLeod|Bradley Lavelle|Patrick Stewart|Ian Holm|Jamie Campbell
title: The Last Dragon
